about_the_game:
Save the ants! The ants need a new home. Help them find their way to their new ant hills. You'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide them, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. This demo has over 30 levels for you to try out.

The full version of the game has over 240 levels, with new bonus levels added every few weeks. Levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.
​
Your solution is rated from 1 to 4 stars, and the high scores list lets you see how you stack up against players all over the world.

The full version also allows you to play levels you create yourself!
detailed_description:
Save the ants! The ants need a new home. Help them find their way to their new ant hills. You'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide them, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. This demo has over 30 levels for you to try out.

The full version of the game has over 240 levels, with new bonus levels added every few weeks. Levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.
​
Your solution is rated from 1 to 4 stars, and the high scores list lets you see how you stack up against players all over the world.

The full version also allows you to play levels you create yourself!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Ants Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this family-friendly 2-d puzzle game, you'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide the ants to their new anthills, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. This demo has over 30 levels, while the full game has over 240 levels ranging from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.
